title: Checkbox
description: Allows users to select one or more items from a list

frontMatter.title: Checkbox
frontMatter.description: Allows users to select one or more items from a list

related.name: Radio Button
related.description: For single selection from a list

when_to_use.value: Multiple selections are needed from a list
Users can select any combination of options
Clear, direct selection mechanisms are required

when_to_consider_else.value: Too many options exist for mobile screen display
Only one selection is allowed (use [Radio Button](../radio-button) instead)
Selecting requires complex conditional logic without progressive disclosure

accessibility.value: Use clear labels describing the controlled group
Provide optional hint text explaining all-select behavior
Test with actual screen reader users

frontMatter.code_usage:
<!-- Single checkbox -->
<va-checkbox
  label="I agree to the terms"
  name="agreement"
  required
></va-checkbox>

<!-- Checkbox group -->
<va-checkbox-group
  label="Select your preferred contact methods"
  required
>
  <va-checkbox label="Email" name="contact" value="email"></va-checkbox>
  <va-checkbox label="Phone" name="contact" value="phone"></va-checkbox>
  <va-checkbox label="Mail" name="contact" value="mail"></va-checkbox>
</va-checkbox-group>
